description: Outline application for the demolition of 415 dwellings, the construction of new roads,the construction of new buildings containing 310 dwellings, shops, day centre and social club, external alterations to existing buildings and new open spaces. Applicants Plan Nos:  Outline planning application document - Rev.A
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun on or before whichever is the later of the following dates:- 1) 5 years from the date of this permission; 2) 2 years from the final approval of details reserved by this outline permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 92(2) of the Town and Planning Act 1990.
